titles.title: On Toward the Goal! Press On (familiar tune

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"On toward the goal!" Press on Alone yet unafraid He cut the path who beckons thee On then and undismayed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"On toward the goal!" Press on The eyes that are aflame Are watching thee what then are men What matter praise or blame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"On toward the goal!" Press on Look not behind thee now When just ahead lies His "Well done" And crowns await thy brow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"On toward the goal" Press on Blind deaf and sometimes dumb Along the blood marked uphill way Hard after Christ press on{/lang-eng}
